title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 28
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 28:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Agenor et al (Eds.) - The Asian Financial Crisis; Causes, Contagion and Consequences (1999)

-  Allen - Financial Crisis and Recession in the Global Economy (1999)

-  Arruda - External Debt; Brazil and the International Financial Crisis (1999)

-  Aziz & Shin (Eds.) - Global Shock, Risks, and Asian Financial Reform (2014)

-  Bailey - The Crisis Regime; the MAC, the EFCB, and the Political Impact of the New York City Financial Crisis (1984)

-  Beblavy et al (Eds.) - The Euro Area and the Financial Crisis (2011)

-  Benczes - Deficit and Debt in Transition; the Political Economy of Public Finances in Central and Eastern Europe (2014)

-  Boyes - Meltdown Iceland; How the Global Financial Crisis Bankrupted an Entire Country (2009)

-  Butzbach & von Mettenheim (Eds.) - Alternative Banking and Financial Crisis (2014)

-  Chiang (Ed.) - Business Groups in East Asia; Financial Crisis, Restructuring, and New Growth (2006)

-  Clark & Heath - Hard Times; Inequality, Recession, Aftermath (2014)

-  Crafts & Fearon (Eds.) - The Great Depression of the 1930s; Lessons for Today (2013)

-  Daedalus - Special Issue on the Financial Crisis & Economic Policy; J. American Academy of Arts & Sciences (Fall, 2010)

-  Dennon - The Economic and Strategic Rise of China and India; Asian Realignments after the 1997 Financial Crisis (2007)

-  Gerding - Law, Bubbles, and Financial Regulation (2014)

-  Gul & Tsui - The Governance of East Asian Corporations; Post Asian Financial Crisis (2004)

-  Jarsulic - Anatomy of a Financial Crisis; a Real Estate Bubble, Runaway Credit Markets, and Regulatory Failure (2010)

-  King - When the Money Runs Out; the End of Western Affluence (2013)

-  Koslowski - The Ethics of Banking; Conclusions from the Financial Crisis (2011)

-  Lewis - Liar's Poker; Rising Through the Wreckage on Wall Street (2014)

-  Lin et al - National Intellectual Capital and the Financial Crisis in Greece, Italy, Portugal, and Spain (2013)

-  Lowenstein - While America Aged; How Pension Debts Ruined General Motors, Stopped the NYC Subway, Bankrupted San Diego, .. (2008)

-  Marsh - Europe's Deadlock; How the Euro Crisis Could Be Solved - and Why It Won't Happen (2013)

-  McDonald & Robinson - A Colossal Failure of Common Sense; the Inside Story of the Collapse of Lehman Brothers (2009)

-  Mengkui (Ed.) - China in the Wake of Asia's Financial Crisis (2009)

-  Moro & Beker - Modern Financial Crises; Argentina, Unites States and Europe (2016)

-  Morris - Wall Streeters; the Creators and Corruptors of American Finance (2015)

-  Muchhala - Ten Years After; Revisiting the Asian Financial Crisis (2007)

-  Paul - The South Sea Bubble; an Economic History of its Origins and Consequences (2011)

-  Rossi & Malavasi (Eds.) - Financial Crisis, Bank Behaviour and Credit Crunch (2016)

-  Teunissen (Ed.) - A Regional Approach to Financial Crisis Prevention; Lessons from Europe and Initiatives in Asia, Latin America and Africa (2002)

-  The Impact of the Financial Crisis on the Insurance Sector and Policy Responses, OECD (2011)

-  Tirole - Financial Crises, Liquidity, and the International Monetary System (2002)

-  Walter - Financial Crises and the Politics of Macroeconomics Adjustments (2013)

-  Zweig - The Devil's Financial Dictionary (2015)
